DOC.brief_summary: The investigators enrolled pediatric patients who are undergoing strabismus surgery. The investigators insert either an I-gel or laryngeal mask airway Supreme and measure the intraocular pressures.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Intra Ocular Pressure After Insertion of the LMA Supreme and LMA Proseal in Pediatric Patients
DOC.detailed_description: We already know that tracheal intubation increased intraocular pressure. We tried to evaluate the change of the intra ocular pressure increase before, during and after insertion the I-gel and LMA Supreme supraglottic airway devices. We enrolled the pediatric patients who are undergoing to strabismus surgery.
DOC.criteria: pediatrics > 2 years pediatrics < 7 years undergoing strabismus surgery pediatrics < 2 years pediatrics > 7 years neuromuscular blockage using
